title: Purchased RP on Amazon and cant redeem it
body: So recently I bought a $25 RP card on amazon. and I got a code that will simply not work. I have tried to change the code around to see if It'll work but no. It just wont work.

replies.body:
Make sure you're entering the code in its entirety, as it's crucial to do so with Amazon RP.

Let me know if this helped.

I am also having this issue and I did enter it exactly as I saw it on the Amazon page. this is what i keep getting 
https://i.imgur.com/kgUgHIX.png]
